Posts.Content: I don't know if any of you are aware of this group, but will post the website in case it helps --- It is a group of women from all over the world who have been fighting this disease in various forms.  They are a great source of information on what has helped and what has not, support and other helpful advice.   Go to http://www.metaplasticbreastcancer.org/
Posts.Title: Metaplastic Breast Cancer has metasticized
